sentence.Network_en: Find out how much your surveyor's and solicitor's fees will be.
sentence.Network_cn: 弄清你要向鉴定员和律师支付多少费用。

sentence.Network_en: Your lender will then send their own surveyor to value the property.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后贷款方会派他们自己的评估员来对房产进行估价。

sentence.Network_en: Call in an architect or surveyor to oversee the work.
sentence.Network_cn: 找个建筑师或监理员来监工。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a supervisor): from Anglo-Norman French surveiour, from the verb surveier (see survey)

entry.def: A surveyor is a person whose job is to survey land.

example.ex: ...the surveyor's maps of the Queen Alexandra Range.
example.tran: 测量员绘制亚历山德拉皇后山脉勘测图

entry.def: A surveyor is a person whose job is to survey buildings.

example.ex: Our surveyor warned us that the house needed totally rebuilding.
example.tran: 我们的鉴定人警告我们这栋房子需要彻底重建。

means.word_mean: 1. an engineer who determines the boundaries and elevations of land or structures
2. someone who conducts a statistical survey

auth_sentence.content: I was working with WHO as a health surveyor.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was working with WHO as a health surveyor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was working with WHO as a health surveyor.

auth_sentence.content: The groma was the standard Roman surveyor's instrument.
auth_sentence.res_content: The groma was the standard Roman surveyor's instrument.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The groma was the standard Roman surveyor's instrument.

auth_sentence.content: Samuel Beckett was...the son of a quantity surveyor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Samuel Beckett was...the son of a quantity surveyor.

means.word_mean: 测量员,勘测员，勘探员；鉴定人

sentences.en: Surveyors mapped out the lie of the land.
The surveyor found damp in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 房屋测量员发现厨房里有水渍。

sentences.en: The surveyor pegged out the lot of land.
sentences.cn: 测量员用木桩标出那块地。

sentences.en: Following an on-site inspection, the surveyor prepared a written report on the property.
sentences.cn: 进行现场勘查之后，测量员出具了这一地产的书面报告。

sentences.en: Confronting great hardships,the surveyors never knocked under.
sentences.cn: 在巨大的艰难困苦面前,那些勘探人员从未屈服过。
